article_title: Blue Cross' $65 Billion Move Away From Fee-For-Service Medicine

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: In the latest blow to fee-for-service medicine, the nation’s Blue Cross and Blue Shield plans say they are spending more than $65 billion annually -- about 20 percent of the medical claim dollars they pay -- on “value-based” care that rewards better outcomes and keeps patients healthy. The moves by the [...]
